m_szDocSumamry: BYD Electric Car Sales Spike In 1st Half of 2014 September 6th, 2014 by James Ayre   The first half of 2014 saw a big spike in the number of electric cars sold by BYD, according to recent reports — an increase of more than 6 times over. Altogether, BYD sold more than 7,600 electric cars during those first six months. That’s enough to make the company the top electric car seller in China, with a 37% share of the market during that period of time.
